descript.abstract: The 2022 Precinct data set represents the geography used for the 2022 election cycle. Information was collected from local election officials along with county/local GIS authorities as well as a validation done by most, but not all jurisdictions. BOE maintains every effort to keep this data correct, however the data set is only as good as the information received from the local election official.More Metadata

idinfo.datacred: Center for Shared Solutions, Department of Technology, Management, and Budget, State of Michigan

attr.attrdef: Unique Identifier for the precinct composed of County/Jurisdiction/WardPrecinct value
County Federal Information Processing Standards code
Minor Civil Division Federal Information Processing Standards code for jurisdiction
Code linking data to Census Data

Contains the value of the 2020 Census’ “Voter (Tabulation) District”, or VTD. The Census/TIGER VTD contains one or more census blocks that approximates the geography of the precinct. Because they’re based upon census blocks, the VTD does not necessarily match the actual geography of the precinct. For more information refer to Chapter 14 of the Geographic Areas Reference Manual (Nov 1994) (Ch14GARM.pdf (census.gov))
Description of voting equipment used in the precinct including vendor

overview.eaover: NOTE: FIELD NAMES ARE TRUNCATED TO 10 CHARACTERS WHEN DOWNLOADING A SHAPEFILE
